about.details:
Incorporated in March 2012, Rexpro Enterprises Limited is a furniture manufacturing company in Vashi Maharastra. The company started as a furniture and fixture business for retailers and acquired clients across multiple retail segments such as fashion, lifestyle, electronics, grocery, beauty, telecom etc.

The company manufactures furniture for offices, hospitals, government offices, and the growing home segment.

The company's clients include Shoppers Stop Limited, One RX India Private Limited (Samsung), Hindustan Unilever, Lenskart, Marks & Spencer Reliance India Private Limited, and Godrej & Boyce Mfg. Co. Limited.

The company has three manufacturing units in Vashi, Maharastra.

As of September 30, 2024, the total employee strength of the company is 65 employees permanently, and a further 126 are on a contractual basis. Nine employees are on the payroll of its subsidiary over and above 65 employees.

Competitive Strength

  • Diverse product range with the ability to produce customized products.
  • Strong Quality Control and Ethical Business Practices
  • Versatile and Multiple Manufacturing facilities
  • Long-term relationship with Key customers
  • Experienced Management Team

faqs.question: What is the Rexpro Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rexpro Enterprises IPO is a SME IPO of 3700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹53.65 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹145 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on January 22, 2025, and closes on January 24, 2025.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rexpro Enterprises IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rexpro Enterprises IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rexpro Enterprises IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rexpro Enterprises IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rexpro Enterprises IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rexpro Enterprises IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rexpro Enterprises IPO opens on January 22, 2025 and closes on January 24, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rexpro Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: Rexpro Enterprises IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,45,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rexpro Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rexpro Enterprises IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Rexpro Enterprises IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Rexpro Enterprises IPO will be done on Monday, January 27, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, January 28, 2025. Check the Rexpro Enterprises IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Rexpro Enterprises IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Rexpro Enterprises IPO listing date is on Wednesday, January 29, 2025.
